summary: Verified CommandCenterPage refactoring - all 20 tests PASSED. Major refactoring from 1464-line monolith to 7 modular components working correctly. UI is identical to before.

TEST 2: Trading tab button exists with data-testid='tab-trading'

TEST 9: WebSocket status indicator exists with data-testid='ws-status'

TEST 11: Connect button exists with data-testid='connect-btn'

critical_code_review_comments: CommandCenterPage.js successfully reduced from 1464 to 165 lines
useCommandCenterData hook properly manages all state and data fetching
HeaderBar component correctly handles ticker search, connection status, system health
QuickStatsRow renders 6 cards with expandable dropdowns for Positions and Alerts
TradingTab shows TradeSignals and TradingBotPanel as expected
AICoachTab shows AICommandPanel and Market Intel sidebar
AnalyticsTab shows LearningDashboard and Scanner sections
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Refactoring verification complete. CommandCenterPage split into 7 modular components: useCommandCenterData hook, HeaderBar, QuickStatsRow, TradingTab, AICoachTab, AnalyticsTab, and UIComponents. All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes. Tab navigation and dropdown interactions work correctly. Minor console errors (WebSocket, 404) are expected when IB Gateway is not connected.
